session
Interface SessionDriver

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSessionDriver, InsecureSessionDriver, SecureSessionDriver
public interface SessionDriver

Interface of the session driver. For every active session s, every location used by s contains an object implementing this interface to handle session s. It allows probing for a remote handler in its location and for model implementations at all locations, and invoking new instances of model implementing objects.

Author:
Ricardo Corr�a (correa@lia.ufc.br)

Method Detail

startLocation

boolean startLocation(java.lang.String locationName)
Forro is started at a specified location. A session handler and a location driver are instantiated at this new location. This method must be invoked before requesting any other RemoteInstantiator methods at the specified location.

Parameters:
locationName - the new location to start
Returns:
true if the session handler and the location driver has been correctly instantiated

startWorkspace

boolean startWorkspace(java.lang.String locationName,
                       java.lang.String workName,
                       java.lang.String workImplName,
                       java.lang.String middleImplName)
A workspace is started with a specified name and a specified middleware. Adds this location to the workspace specified by its name and the name of the class implementing it. If the specified workspace does not exist yet, then this method instantiates a new workspace driver to handle the new workspace created. The middleware used by this workspace is specified by the name of the class implementing it.

Parameters:
locationName - TODO
workName - the new workspace to start
workImplName - TODO
middleImplName - the implementation of the workspace driver, which determines the type of the workspace
Returns:
true if workspace has been correctly instantiated

startLink

boolean startLink(java.lang.String linkName,
                  java.lang.String originName,
                  java.lang.String destinationName)
A link is started with a specified name, at a specified workspace and connecting two specified locations. This method automatically assigns the locations involved to the workspace.

Parameters:
linkName - WorkspaceName.LinkName
originName - this location invokes this method at the destination, and then starts the link locally.
destinationName - this location only starts the link locally
Returns:
true if link has been correctly instantiated

startModel

boolean startModel(java.lang.String locationName,
                   java.lang.String modelName,
                   ModelEmulator modelEmu)
Instantiates a Forr� model implementation, which takes as input a list of other model implementations. This method asks for the location driver of the specified location to instantiate the model as an object.

Parameters:
locationName - the location where the new instance is to be created
modelName - the implementation's name
modelEmu - TODO
Returns:
true if the model has been correctly instantiated.

bindPorts

boolean bindPorts(java.lang.String providesPortName,
                  java.lang.String usesPortName,
                  java.lang.String linkName,
                  BindingProperties bindingProp)
Bind a uses port to a provides port. The model component of each port is specified. This binding operation should be performed by the session handler at the uses port location.

To perform the binding operation, the session handler at the uses port location first bind the uses port at the model driver of the specified uses model component. Then, it takes the hash code of the uses port returned and asks to the session handler at the provides port location to bind the provides port.

Parameters:
providesPortName - the provides port name locationName.modelName.portName
usesPortName - the uses port name locationName.modelName.portName
linkName - WorkspaceName.linkName
bindingProp - TODO
Returns:
true if the port could be correctly created and bound

bindUsesPort

boolean bindUsesPort(java.lang.String usesPortName,
                     java.lang.String providesPortName,
                     java.lang.String linkName,
                     BindingProperties bindingProp)

                             java.lang.String linkName,
                             BindingProperties bindingProp)
Gets the views of the model according to the specified array of view names.

Parameters:
providesPortName - the port name modelName.portName
linkName - TODO
bindingProp - TODO
Returns:
an array with the requested views, in the same that their names appear in the view names array

probe

boolean[] probe(java.lang.String locationName,
                java.lang.String[] implName)
Probe the specified location for the specified active implementations.

Parameters:
locationName - the location
implName - the implementations
Returns:
an array indexed by the specified implementations. Each element of this array is true if the corresponding implementation is active at the specified location
